greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of A186430.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} A053657(n)/(A053657(k)*A053657(n-k)), with the convention that A053657(0) = 1.
maple: # A186431, uses program for A053657 written by Peter Luschny:
A053657 := proc(n) local P, p, q, s, r;
for p in P do s := 0; q := p-1;
do if q > (n-1) then break fi;
s := s + iquo(n-1, q); q := q*p; od;
r := r * p^s; od; r end:
mathematica: b[n_] := b[n] = Product[p^Sum[Floor[(n-1)/((p-1) p^k)], {k, 0, n}], {p, Prime[ Range[n]]}];
results.author: _Peter Bala_, Feb 21 2011
